home.campus_france_steps: Makambo ya kosala na Campus France
home.campus_france_desc: Tokosunga yo na kosala dossier ya Campus France, banda na diplôme tii na préinscription.
home.scholarships_financial_aid: Ba bourse mpe lisungi ya mbongo
home.scholarships_desc: Tokoteya yo ndenge ya kozwa bourse mpo na koteya na mboka mosusu.
home.campus_france_support_desc: Tokosala elongo na yo na etape nyonso ya Campus France, banda na compte tii na entretien.
home.diploma_recognition_desc: Tokosunga yo mpo na kondima diplôme na France.
home.registration_help_desc: Tokosunga yo pona kotánga formation mpe kosala dossier ya admission.
home.scholarships_financing_desc: Zwá mayele mpo na kosenga bourse to lisungi ya mbongo.
home.about_us_desc: Tosungi ba étudiants ya Afrika na projet na bango ya koteya na mboka mosusu. Banda na dossier tii na visa, tozali elongo na bango mpo na kosala suivi ya malamu mpe efficace.
home.trust_relationship_desc: Confiance ezali kati na ndenge tozali kosunga yo.
home.recommended_by_students_desc: Ba étudiants mingi bazali kosolola malamu mpo na biso.

testimonial_two_data.name: Mira
testimonial_two_data.position: Etudiante na Master, Université Marien Ngouabi
testimonial_two_data.testimonial: Na lisungi na bango, nakokaki kosala dossier Campus France. Nazwaki préinscription na France sans problème.

testimonial_two_data.name: Clergé
testimonial_two_data.testimonial: Lisungi na bango mpo na bourse ezalaki ya malamu. Nazwaki aide financière oyo esengelaki mpo na ngai.

testimonial_two_data.name: Yohan NKOU
testimonial_two_data.testimonial: Basalisaki ngai na ndenge ya kosala makambo ya Campus France. Makambo esalemaki na kimia mpe mbangu.

testimonial_two_data.name: Kennedy
testimonial_two_data.testimonial: Nazalaki na mposa ya kondima diplôme na ngai na France. Mayele na bango esalisaki ngai mingi mpo na kosala dossier ya malamu. Service ezalaki ya mbangu mpe ya malamu.

testimonial_two_data.name: Tieboukoulou Frank
testimonial_two_data.testimonial: Basalisaki ngai na makambo nyonso: inscription, visa, logement. Lisungi na bango ezalaki ya malamu mingi, nalingi koloba 100%!

testimonial_two_data.name: Boursier
testimonial_two_data.position: Etudiante na Master, Université Marien Ngouabi
testimonial_two_data.testimonial: Na lisungi na bango, nakokaki kosala dossier Campus France. Nazwaki préinscription na France sans problème.

university_application_form.instructions: Salisá formulaire na ba informations ya yo ya moto mpe ya école mpo opostuler.
university_application_form.required_fields: Ba champs oyo ezali na * esengeli kotondisama.
university_application_form.success_message: Candidature na yo esalemaki na bomoko!
university_application_form.error_message: Esalemaki problème na tinda. Tuná lisusu ba informations na yo.

university_deadlines.intro: Talá ba dates ya nsuka ya kosala candidature mpe inscription.

deadlines_list.event: Mokolo ya nsuka ya kotindela candidature

university_deadlines.note: Salá makasi mpo otika te ba dates wana, soki te okoki kozwa retard.

faq.intro: Ozali na motuna? Talá ba eyano ya mituna oyo basalaka mingi.

faq_items.question: Ndenge nini nakoki kosala candidature?
faq_items.answer: Salisá formulaire na site na page ya candidature.

faq_items.question: Naboyi koyeba ba documents nini esengeli?
faq_items.answer: Diplôme, relevé ya notes, carte d’identité, mpe lettre de motivation.

faq_items.question: Ndenge nini nakoki koyeba soki nazwaki admission?
faq_items.answer: Résultats ekozala na site na biso na mokolo oyo ezali na page ya Dates limites.

faq_items.question: Nakoki kosenga bourse?
faq_items.answer: Ee, tozali na équipe oyo ekosunga yo mpo na bourse.

faq.contact_support: Soki oyebi lisusu te, contactá biso mpo na lisungi.
